resources.string: You can\'t mark habit while you are editing it
"Count of days user wants to be marked maintained"
There are no habit parameters or all of them have no values
There is no data about habits
Statistics and predictions of habit parameters

Reminder will be triggered everyday on a time of day picked by the user. Note that if the user picks a time earlier than the previously set, reminder will be triggered on the next day. Note also that if the user marks habit past one day after they marked it, if they do it after 23:59:00 of that day, that day will be marked as skipped and the day after that day will be marked instead.
You can\'t add more habit parameters (maximum of %s)

In this period:
Habit was marked %s times
Habit was skipped %s times
Habit was marked maintained %s times
Habit was marked not maintained %s times

Percentage of times in which it was marked maintained: %s
Percentage of times it was skipped: %s
Habit will be evaluated every %s marked day/days\nHabit is expected to be marked maintained in at least %s days in this period
Count of days when user may want to skip habit
You may not be able to accomplish given marking count with given skip count. Consider skipping less days or extending the evaluation period.
You missed %d days; application marked them as skipped
"Tap Back button again to cancel marking habit; note that if reminder ought to remind the user before the current time, it won't fire until the next day
No habit parameters to provide values for this habit
Note: count of days the user want to skip is not enforced on the user; the app requires the user to only mark this habit maintained by the count of days given by the user
Count of days with habit maintained in this period
Count of days with not habit maintained in this period
Count of days skipped in this period
